00034         function four_oh_four(){
00035                 header("HTTP/1.0 404 Not Found");
00036                 $url = func_get_args();
00037                 $url = baseUrl(implode('/', $url));
00038                 $this->data['error404'] = 'Sorry, the page you were looking for could not be found:';
00039                 $this->data['page'] = sEscape::html($url);
00040                 $this->data['header'] = 'Error 404';
00041                 $this->template->render('four-oh-four', $this->data);
